title: Looking for Top for TeGC
body:
Hey there,

I am currently looking for a top laner for my team as a fill in until season 7 starts up again.

Leave a comment with your top five champions for top lane

replies.body:
Hi
Not a top lane main, but i do occasionally play
Champs are: Ekko, Riven, Fiora, Gnar and Rumble
I was b5, so only add me if you desperately need someone 
Sherk420

{{champion:245}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:68}}
